meanings.definition: To have the same opinion or be in harmony.
meanings.sent1: Tom and Sarah agrees on their favorite color.
meanings.sent2: The team agrees to work together for the project.
meanings.sent3: The cats agrees to take turns napping in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The stars agrees to shine brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The music and lyrics agrees perfectly in the song.

meanings.definition: To be consistent or match in number or gender.
meanings.sent1: The subject agrees with the verb in the sentence.
meanings.sent2: The colors of the painting agrees with the room decor.
meanings.sent3: The shoes agrees with the outfit perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The puzzle pieces agrees to fit together snugly.
meanings.sent5: The ingredients agrees in proportion for the recipe.
